attributes.description: VERY VERY SPECIAL VEHICLE 100 accident free and original, full service history, every single service completed on schedule and up to date. These 2.0 petrol naturally aspirated engines were absolutely brilliant. so simple and easy to maintain. from a time before these cars became too electronic and troublesome The vehicle is absolutely Spotless Condition, Alpine White, Upholstery is like new and finished with Piano black trim, SUCH A CLASSIC AND BEAUTIFUL COMBINATION. Perfectly Looked After By Responsible Previous Owner, 4 GOODYEAR TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION you simply cannot find an A3 WITH SUCH LOW MILEAGE AND COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE HISTORY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA. We know the previous owner personally and he has taken very special car of this car and was so sad to see it go THIS CAR STANDS HEAD AND SHOULDERS ABOVE THE REST, If you are looking for a similar vehicle then you owe it to yourself to at least test drive this one before making a decision must be seen to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
attributes.title: 2008 Audi A3 3-dr 2.0 Attraction

attributes.description: WOW, LOOK AT THIS, THIS BABY IS DEFENITELY THE ONE YOU HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR Super clean car, 20 out of 10, Perfectly original and immaculate in every way, Full Service History with PORSCHE INCLUDING SERVICE RECENTLY COMPLETED. BOSE SOUND PACKAGE Perfectly Looked after by responsible previous owner who nursed this car. Although underrated by most, AMONGST THE MOST SOPHISTICATED BLUE BLOODED PETROL HEADS, THIS VERSION OF THE BOXSTER S IN MANUEL TRANSMITION IS CONSIDERED TO BE ONE OF THE BEST SPORTS CARS EVER MADE, 3.6 liter normally aspirated bullet proof engine, Manuel gearbox, rear wheel drive, 206 KW of power. Feels very similar to the BMW E46 M3. a pure, uncomplicated thoroughbred machine Simple and reliable, an absolute breeze to maintain This is a very rare opportunity to own one with good mileage and comprehensive history for the same price as a used 1.0 liter polo. Its actually quite stupid when you think about it Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
